title: Nevermore
description: This new incarnation of the multi-million copy-selling Maximum Ride series is the perfect way to discover the blockbuster adventures of a heroic flock of winged kids! This final volume contains the heart stopping final novel in the series, Nevermore , along with new material that bridges this story with Angel . Maximum Ride and her faithful friends stand ready to face an unbeatable plot to destroy life as we know it once and for all-and this time, the enemy truly can't be stopped. Could this be the heart-stopping conclusion to the epic Maximum Ride series?
author: James  Patterson
